rainyDescriptions: Why did the weather report bring an umbrella to work? It wanted to be 'prepared'!
Rainy days are like an introverted kid's dream - everyone stays inside!
The weather is so rainy, even the clouds need a break!
Why did the man put his money in the blender? He wanted to make liquid assets for the rainy day!
What falls but never gets hurt? The rain!
The rain is so heavy, I'm starting to think I need a snorkel to go outside!
Why did the raindrop win an award? It was outstanding in its field of fluid dynamics!
The weather's so rainy, even the worms are considering building arks!
Why was the math book sad on a rainy day? Because it had too many problems!
This weather is perfect for ducks - they must be having a quacking good time!
